commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The second match of the ice skating competition will be You versus Mari in a figure skating contest!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Can the both of you figure skate?

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: No problem! My passion is burning after watching Rin and Setsu's blazing battle! I feel like I can do anything right now!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I'll be fine! I've done some jumps and spins just from looking at how they do them in figure skating competitions before. I mean, in my head at least!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: By the way, how are you gonna decide on the results? Are you gonna keep some kind of score?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: As this is not an official figure skating competition, might I suggest the person who pulls off the most elements in three minutes be crowned the winner?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I can roll with that. Sounds pretty straightforward.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: So that means I just have to whip out as many moves as possible, right?!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: All right! I'll show off all of my skating skills!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Then with that settled, let us begin! I hereby announce the start of the figure skating contest!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Let's have fun skating! I'm not gonna hold back! Here I go!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: My special move! The layback Mari-bauer!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: *Chuckle* I haven't done that since I was a kid, but it looks like I've still got it!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: S-She maintains a wide-legged stance and leans back with such energy, much like that famous element first unveiled at the Olympics!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: I will be taking home the crown in this contest!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Eeeeeek! How does she skate in that position?! I'm trembling just watching her!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Not bad, Mari! But I'm not gonna lose here! Hup! Away I go!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Whoa! You's amazing! Look at her spin with one leg raised in the air! She looks like a pro figure skater!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I'm skating better than I thought! Since this is going so well, maybe I can pull off that, uh, t-triple axel thing I saw on TV. All right, I'm gonna give it a shot!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Three and a half spins, right? Here I go! Ready and... Hah!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: O-Oh wow, I d-did... ACK! Gahhh!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Owww... I messed up. *Laugh* Guess that's not something an amateur can just pull off on a whim.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I don't think I had enough spins, either. Maybe I got two in?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The element count stands at eight for Mari and six for You... Which means the winner of the second match is Mari!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Yay! Thank you! I am wonderful!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: That was incredible. You just kept whipping out impressive moves after that big one. I don't know how to even describe your performance. It was dramatic and dynamic!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Figure skating is all about captivating the audience, right?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Are you okay, You? Did you land on your hips or knees when you fell?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Shouldn't you sit down? You shouldn't force yourself if you're hurt. I mean, it's not like I'm worried or anything! It'd just be a pain if you collapsed, that's all!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: I'm fine, I'm fine! I braced myself for the fall so it was nothing. Thanks, though!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: It's a shame I lost, but I had a lot of fun! I wanna pull off my jump next time...if there is a next time, that is!
